title: ETHZilla takes stake in Karus to tokenize AI-modeled auto-loan portfolios
contentSnippet: The deal grants ETHZilla access to Karus’s AI underwriting engine and loan origination network, positioning the crypto treasury company to offer auto credit onchain in 2026.

title: Filecoin Gains 2% Alongside Crypto Rally
contentSnippet: The token tracked broader crypto sentiment on below-average volume, establishing an ascending trend.

title: Ethereum's 'Fusaka' Upgrade Cements Network's Role as On-Chain Finance Settlement Layer: Bitwise
contentSnippet: The upgrade will boost throughput, keep validators efficient and, most importantly, strengthen Ethereum's value capture by putting a floor under blob fees.

title: Taiwan eyes 2026 stablecoin launch as crypto legislation advances: Report
contentSnippet: A Taiwan-issued stablecoin pegged to either the country’s dollar or the US dollar could enter the market in the second half of 2026 based on related legislation.

title: Miners are turning off their machines: Why even new rigs can’t break even
contentSnippet: Miner margins are collapsing as hash price hits record lows. This guide explains 2025 economics, break-even tests and what struggling operators can do.

title: The Protocol: Ethereum Preps For Upcoming Fusaka Upgrade
contentSnippet: Also: Anthropic On DeFi AI Agents, ETH Devs Push ZK Protocol, and Bitnomial

title: Trump's CFTC, FDIC Picks Closer to Taking Over Agencies as They Advance in Senate
contentSnippet: The Senate's process is inching forward on a mass-confirmation that would include two nominations with major crypto implications.

title: Bitcoin Futures Return to Deepest 'Backwardation' Since FTX Collapse Hinting Possible Bottom
contentSnippet: So-called "backwardation" — a futures price curve moving lower in value as time gets further out — can be read as a measure of stress in the market.

title: Firelight Introduces XRP Staking for DeFi Insurance Layer Against Exploits
contentSnippet: The new protocol, developed by Sentora and Flare Network, aims to combine XRP yield opportunity with offering protection against DeFi hacks.

title: ETHZilla Buys 20% of AI Lending Platform Karus in $10M Deal to Tokenize Auto Loans
contentSnippet: The companies plan to tokenize auto loans, with the first portfolios expected to be available by early 2026.

title: Stellar Climbs 2% as Volume Spikes Signal Institutional Interest
contentSnippet: Trading activity jumps 37% above weekly average despite modest price gains.

title: Why Tether is buying more gold than many central banks and what it signals
contentSnippet: Tether’s rapid gold accumulation in Q3 2025 surpassed many national banks. This move reflects Tether’s strategy to build gold reserves.

title: Ostium Raises $20M Series A Led by General Catalyst, Jump Crypto to Put TradFi Perps Onchain
contentSnippet: Built on Arbitrum, the perpetuals protocol has processed $25 billion in trading volume by offering self-custodial bets on gold, FX and other real-world markets.

title: HBAR Edges Higher as Vanguard ETF Access Expands Institutional Appeal
contentSnippet: Hedera gains on elevated volume while establishing support above $0.1427 during measured advance that coincides with significant institutional developments.

title: CleanSpark lifts output and power as Bitcoin miners face strain
contentSnippet: November production rose 11% and contracted power topped 1.4 GW, even as falling bitcoin prices and tighter margins pressure the mining sector.

title: Eric Trump’s American Bitcoin Steadies After ‘First Major Unlock' of Shares
contentSnippet: The stock was volatile after insiders took profits.

title: Can BNB price retake $1K in December?
contentSnippet: Multiple bullish signals, including a double bottom and falling wedge breakout, are aligning to potentially lift the BNB price toward $1,000 in December.

title: Ethereum treasury demand collapses: Will it delay ETH’s recovery to $4K?
contentSnippet: Collapsed Ethereum treasury demand and stiff overhead resistance between $3,100 and $3,200 stood in the way of Ether’s recovery to $4,000.

title: Bitcoin back above $92K, BlackRock bullish on a tokenized future, Kalshi raise $11B - Daily Crypto Recap
contentSnippet:
Your Decrypt daily recap with @tyler_did_it for December 3rd 2025

Today’s headlines: BTC jumps back above $92K, BlackRock bullish on tokenized assets, Kalshi raise $11B, & more

title: Opera, Celo Scale Up Partnership to 'Make Stablecoins Useful' For Millions of Users
contentSnippet: The two firms are extending their partnership with new features and an expansion into global markets amid rising stablecoin use on MiniPay.

title: Strategy’s Michael Saylor on potential MSCI exclusion: ‘We’re engaging’
contentSnippet: Strategy is urging MSCI to retain MSTR in its indexes, despite raising its Bitcoin holdings to 650,000 BTC as it has lowered its 2025 targets.

title: Sony's Blockchain Partner Launches Institutional-Grade Stablecoin for Soneium
contentSnippet: Institutional-grade dollar stablecoin USDSC has gone live on Soneium, as Japan advances yen stablecoin trials.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Binance’s new ‘Junior’ app draws mixed reactions over kids entering crypto
contentSnippet: Binance’s new Junior app aims to bring supervised crypto use to minors, prompting both praise for early education and criticism of child targeting.

title: Morning Minute: Bank of America Recommends up to 4% Crypto Portfolio Allocation
contentSnippet: The crypto market liked the news, with majors jumping 7-10% on the back of Bank of America's new guidance plus Vanguard's crypto ETF debut.

title: UK Passes Digital Assets Bill Recognizing Crypto as Property
contentSnippet: The law gives crypto legal status as property, bolstering protections for users and advancing the UK’s bid to become a digital finance hub.

title: Australian Bitcoin Group Challenges ABC News Over 'Misleading' Coverage
contentSnippet: The ABIB claims that ABC "misrepresented Bitcoin's purpose" and conflated it with criminal activity in its coverage.

title: Bitcoin Short-Term Holder Shakeout Could Accelerate Recovery Above Key Level
contentSnippet: A breakout above $93,000 could trigger a short squeeze, analysts say—accelerating Bitcoin’s recovery amid short-term holder capitulation.

title: XRP ETF、13取引日で8億ドル（約1240億円）到達　仮想通貨史上2番目の速さ
contentSnippet: XRP現物ETFが上場13日で8億ドル超の流入を達成し、ビットコインETFに次ぐ史上2番目の速さを記録。ソラナETFを大きく上回るペースで、アナリストは最大1兆円超の市場規模を予測。

title: バイナンス（海外）、15種類の現物取引ペアを停止へ　12月5日実施
contentSnippet: バイナンス（海外）は流動性レビューに基づき、12月5日に現物取引ペア15種を停止すると発表。停止は特定ペアのみで、対象トークンの上場廃止を意味しない。取引ボットも同時に終了予定。

title: ゲンスラー前SEC委員長「仮想通貨は投機的」　ビットコイン除く全トークンに警告
contentSnippet: ゲンスラー前SEC委員長がブルームバーグのインタビューで、ビットコインを除くすべての仮想通貨を「極めて投機的」と評価。退任後も投資家保護の重要性を強調し、規制の観点からビットコインのみをコモディティとして区別する姿勢を維持している。

title: HashPortウォレット、Pontaポイントでステーブルコインの購入が可能に
contentSnippet: HashPortは12月1日、HashPort WalletでPontaポイントをBase上のUSDCやcbBTCに交換できる「オンランプ」機能と、暗号資産をau PAYギフトカードに変換する「オフランプ」機能を開始した。

title: Gunmen Steal $85,800 in Trinidad Crypto Ambush as Attacks on Holders Rise
contentSnippet: Armed robberies of crypto buyers are rising globally as criminals abandon digital hacks for brutal in-person confrontations.

title: Anthropic Starts Early IPO Prep Ahead of Possible 2026 Debut: Report
contentSnippet: Anthropic is reportedly exploring a public market debut while chasing a new funding round that could push its valuation past $300 billion.

title: カルシが米CNNの公式パートナーに、予測市場のリアルタイムデータを報道に統合
contentSnippet: 米予測市場プラットフォームのカルシがCNNと提携し公式予測市場パートナーになった。カルシのリアルタイムデータがCNN番組全体に統合され、政治的・文化的イベントの確率情報を報道に活用する。ソラナ上でのトークン化予測市場も開始した。

title: ストラテジーCEO「米ドル準備金でビットコイン売却回避」、配当戦略を語る
contentSnippet: 米ストラテジー社CEOが今後の準備金や配当戦略を詳細に説明した。米ドル準備金で当面の配当資金を確保し、ビットコイン売却を回避する。レンディング参入の可能性も示唆した。

title: イーロンの「Xマネー」決済システム開発で人材募集　ソラナが支援表明
contentSnippet: イーロン・マスク氏のX Moneyが決済プラットフォームの技術責任者を募集。ソラナが協力を表明し、仮想通貨統合の可能性に注目が集まる。WeChat型スーパーアプリ実現への動きを解説。

title: 「資産トークン化が金融のあり方を変革」ブラックロックのフィンクCEOらが論説
contentSnippet: ブラックロックのフィンクCEOらが現実資産（RWA）トークン化の可能性を様々な観点から解説した。トークン化の2つの大きな利点や規制当局の役割などにも言及している。

title: バイナンス傘下Trust Wallet、予測市場へのアクセス機能をローンチ　ポリマーケットなどに対応へ
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨ウォレットのTrust Walletは、予測市場にアクセスできる機能をローンチ。まずはMyriad、ポリマーケット、カルシの3つの予測市場に対応する。

title: クラーケン、Backed買収　米国株のトークン化取引を拡大
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨取引所クラーケンがスイスのBacked Finance買収を発表。トークン化株式サービス「xStocks」は半年で取引高100億ドルを突破。RWA市場は2028年に2兆ドル規模へ成長見込み。
